descriptions.posh: Posh is composed, exacting, and quietly powerful. You notice details others miss, you edit before you add, and you believe everything should serve a purpose. Style is not decoration for you, it is strategy. People turn to you to keep things sharp, elevated, and under control.
descriptions.baby: Baby is soft on the surface but strong underneath. You bring comfort into busy rooms, you notice needs before they are spoken, and you make kindness feel like a form of leadership. People open up around you because they feel safe in your presence, and they stay because your warmth has real strength behind it.
descriptions.sporty: Sporty is drive made visible. You thrive on goals, progress, and the buzz of being in motion. Discipline does not restrict you, it frees you to push further. Pressure sharpens you instead of shaking you. People rely on you when they need someone to cut through distraction and get things done.
descriptions.ginger: Ginger is intelligence on fire. You love culture, conversation, and bold ideas, and you always find the words others are searching for. Curiosity is your anchor, clarity is your tool. People come to you for context, insight, and the courage to say what needs to be said.
descriptions.scary: Scary is intensity with heart. You live out loud, take risks others would never dare, and refuse to shrink yourself. Your energy can flip the mood of a whole room in seconds. People feel braver, wilder, and freer when you are there, because you show them what it means to live unapologetically.
